channel.title: ecmascript on Andri Rakotomalala
channel.description: Recent content in ecmascript on Andri Rakotomalala

item.title: Javascript (ECMAScript) in 30 minutes
item.description: Simple values 155 10.23 true false 'test' "test" null undefined NaN // 0/0 Not a Number Infinity // 1/0 // array declaration [1,2,3,4] // anonymous object declaration with properties firstName and surname {firstName:'John', surname:'Doe'} Basic syntax doStuff(); // Statements **can** be terminated by ; doStuff() // or not... // variable declaration var a = 1; var a=1, b=2, c=3; // multiple declarations // a variable can be initialized without a declaration!
